name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Selfish of a Rough Stone【#星街すいせい４周年LIVE 】 [RDHf9Tmdvpk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro montage and title sequence for Hoshimachi Suisei's 4th anniversary live.
Performance of the song 'Template' by Hoshimachi Suisei.

subtitles.original: ライブ後に重大告知あり！
subtitles.english: Important announcement after the live!

subtitles.original: Starring 星街すいせい
subtitles.english: Starring Hoshimachi Suisei

subtitles.original:
Selfish of a Rough Stone
Hoshimachi Suisei 4th Anniversary
subtitles.english:
Selfish of a Rough Stone
Hoshimachi Suisei 4th Anniversary

subtitles.original: 一人一つの存在とは限らない
subtitles.english: You're not necessarily limited to a single existence.

subtitles.original: Why can't I stop it?
subtitles.english: Why can't I stop it?

subtitles.original: 昨日の違う私が違う答え出してたんだろう
subtitles.english: A different version of me yesterday must've given a different answer.

subtitles.original: Why can't I stop it?
subtitles.english: Why can't I stop it?

subtitles.original: Go as you like, Yes or No
subtitles.english: Go as you like, Yes or No

subtitles.original: どちらも気分次第
subtitles.english: Either one is just a matter of mood.

subtitles.original: 飽きもしない自分がもっといるの
subtitles.english: There are more versions of me that I'll never grow tired of.

subtitles.original: この退屈な世界を渡るには
subtitles.english: In order to cross this boring world...

subtitles.original: 力を合わせなきゃダメよ
subtitles.english: ...we have to join forces.

subtitles.original: ほら私とあなたと私なら
subtitles.english: See, if it's me, and you, and me...

subtitles.original: やがて奇跡が起きちゃって
subtitles.english: ...then eventually a miracle will happen.

subtitles.original: だけど今は 我慢しようか
subtitles.english: But for now, shall we hold back?

subtitles.original: 至福の時さ Step up power
subtitles.english: It's a blissful time, step up power!

subtitles.original: 一日の記憶で一人だと信じ込んで
subtitles.english: Convinced that I'm just one person with a single day's memory...

subtitles.original: Just can't stop it
subtitles.english: Just can't stop it

subtitles.original: 真の姿がみんなと違うことを嫌悪して
subtitles.english: ...loathing that my true form is different from everyone else's.

subtitles.original: Go for it, Just stopじゃない
subtitles.english: Go for it, it's not a "Just stop."

subtitles.original: 彷徨わず跳んじゃえば
subtitles.english: If you just jump without wandering...

subtitles.original: No stop and run, Stopじゃない
subtitles.english: No stop and run, it's not a "Stop."

subtitles.original: 彷徨わず跳んじゃえば
subtitles.english: If you just jump without wandering...
